channel.title: Posts on Kendric's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kendric's Blog

item.title: Test Post
item.description: This is my first post using GitHub pages + Hugo. In the past, I have attempted to maintain a website in a couple of iterations, namely: Tumblr (before it went NSFW): around 2010-2012 Wordpress: around 2014-2017 Jekyll + AWS: around 2017-2018 Medium: 2018-2019 Ghost: around 2021 (TODO: I should look at my past history and see if I can find them.) Back then, I had thought that having a personal/professional website was important for me to maintain.
